Reviews.Title: Great TV for a bedroom!
Reviews.Author: J. Johnson
Reviews.Content: Bought two of these for Christmas gifts for my daughters.  Set them up in their bedrooms and work quite well.  Picture is great and the built in speakers do the job.  One is hooked up to DirecTV and a desktop computer, both via HDMI...works awesome.  Have not tried off air or basic cable as my house is not set up for either one.  There were better deals out there on black friday, but don't like trusting all of the unknown name brands.  This is a good flat screen TV and they were $169 each on black friday.  My girls and I are very pleased.

Reviews.Title: Excellent!!
Reviews.Author: viper
Reviews.Content: TV arrived on time as described. Everything was nicely packaged in the box and set up was less than 10 minutes. The picture quality is exceptional, the size for me was perfect! If you have a college kid or need a spare tv this is a very nice one to get!

Reviews.Title: great
Reviews.Author: Richard Poretll
Reviews.Content: Every thing it was said to be. Very pleased with the postage and handling. No trouble setting up the set.

Reviews.Title: Not a great t.v
Reviews.Author: Janet L. Rankin "petsrus"
Reviews.Content: Bought this t.v for my master bedroom. I didn't want to spend a lot. The t.v is just o.k. Color is not great, colors are dull. Picture is not great, not crisp.Volume is very poor, can't hear the t.v in the adjoining bathroom even at top volume. I spent a lot of time trying to fine tune everything but in the end it is what it is, very blah. I really should send it back but won't. It'll do for now. It's really not worth more than what I paid for it. All in all, very so so. I really can't recommend this t.v. Shipping on the other hand, was amazing. It was here less than 24 hrs. from me placing the order. Amazon never ceases to amaze me with their service and shipping.

Reviews.Title: Sound
Reviews.Author: Kenneth Wilhelm
Reviews.Content: The Sound could be better.  It is hard to hear and the picture is amazing.  I would buy it again.

Reviews.Title: 24 inch Magnavox TV
Reviews.Author: larry carter
Reviews.Content: We purchased the tv for our grandchildren.  Since they love it, we love it too.  The picture is clear and the sound is good.  For the price, I don't think that we could have gotten anything better. We all are very happy!

Reviews.Title: Works great, excellent price
Reviews.Author: LEROY A DUCK "Drake Russell"
Reviews.Content: Works great, excellent price, nice features, & and trusted name, what more can you ask for? I was worried when it first arrived as the box was ripped open mid-way down the box (center screen) including the Styrofoam packing and the microfoam sleeve protector. Fortunately it had not cut into the sticky plastic sheet protector or cracked the screen. It was shipped in only the factory box, with no thought of rough handling by warehouse/shipping personnel.

Reviews.Title: Great deal, just ok tv.
Reviews.Author: Michael J. Scarborough "scrabo"
Reviews.Content: The quality of the tv is just okay, but at the price, what more would you expect? There is much to be said about the brilliance, brightness and crispness of the picture, but in a kids room it hardly seems to matter.Consider for a very inexpensive second tv. Good for gaming as well.

Reviews.Title: Love It
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: The screen is amazing, good color,with easy directions that are easy to follow. I purchase Magnavox because the quality is good. This is a television for the bedroom.

Reviews.Title: great tv
Reviews.Author: Simona
Reviews.Content: Great TV for a small bedroom. This TV is used only for gaming and it has a great picture. Arrived on time. Can't complain.

Reviews.Title: Great
Reviews.Author: Lisa M. Valentine
Reviews.Content: Wonderful TV.  Great picture, great price and it was delivered on time and intact!  For my son who uses this for his monitor, to play video games on and regular tv.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: camden108
Reviews.Content: shipped fairly quickly and has a great picture. its a little smaller then I had expected. my main dislike with this purchase was the shipping. when it came to my door it wasnt in a box at all, it was literally shipped in the actual box the tv is in which has holes in it for handling. so my tv was exposed to the elements the whole time it was being transported. not good

Reviews.Title: The tv is fine
Reviews.Author: Nance Ward
Reviews.Content: I had a bit of trouble with the order but eventually Amazon tech understood what I was saying and came up with a solution that eventually worked for me.

Reviews.Title: tv
Reviews.Author: lori leone
Reviews.Content: this was a gift for my daughter for xmas she was very excited to get it..its a great little tv and the cost was amazing

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Dennis W. Black
Reviews.Content: This TV was bought for my mother-in-law in an assisted living facility. It was relatively inexpensive and  fits her needs exactly.

Reviews.Title: very grainy picture
Reviews.Author: Amazon Customer
Reviews.Content: Purchased to use primarily as a computer monitor. Much too grainy to use as a monitor. To watch a movie, sit in another room.

ProductInfo.Features:
3 HDMI Inputs
PC Input
Side and rear inputs
JPEG Photo Viewer
Auto Volume leveler
ProductInfo.Name: Magnavox 24ME403V/F7 24-Inch 60Hz LED HDTV
